name: Between Two Worlds (MrOrange9JCT, Inari_8)
description:
Change between the Shadow and the Over world to defeat all the enemies and escape from this maze of castles and dungeons.

In this roguelike game, your player is separated in two worlds, the Shadow World and the Over World. You can change between two worlds, you can use this to you advantage but the enemies can too! So be careful and keep changing worlds to beat the game.

Controls:

  • WASD: Move player
  • Click: Attack (mouse direction)
  • Scroll Up: Change to shadow world
  • Scroll Down: Change to over world

Credits:

  • Main Developer: @inari_8
  • Developing Helper & GFX: @MrOrange9JCT
  • Assets: Kenney Assets
